email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Vessel details: DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. The initial freight rate is $25/MT CIF. Laycan is 1-5 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can you consider lowering it to $22/MT? Also, could you provide details on the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. I can adjust the freight rate to $23/MT CIF. The loading window is 48 hours, and the demurrage rate is $15,000/day. Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Michael Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can proceed with the rate of $23/MT CIF. Please send over the recap for our records.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: $23/MT CIF
- Laycan: 1-5 October
- Demurrage: $15,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Michael Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

The recap looks good. We will proceed as agreed. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
